note:
100% cafe-free author of pulptastic fantasy, dark fantasy and even a bit of sci-fi-lite: tales of fighting faeries, LARPing demons, sentient interdimensional marketplaces, and many more!
Mythology, folklore, indie games and horror movies are my jam, but this isn't a 'themed' account so I may talk about anything from pop-culture to social issues.
